description:
推动产业结构迈向中高端。制造业是我们的优势产业。We will move forward in industrial structural upgrading, aiming at a medium-high level. Manufacturing is a traditionally a strong area for Chinese industry.

推动 move forward in
中高端 a medium-high level
优势产业 a strong area

要实施“中国制造2025”，坚持创新驱动、智能转型、强化基础、绿色发展，加快从制造大国转向制造强国。We will implement the “Made in China 2025″ strategy; seek innovation-driven development; apply smart technologies; strengthen foundations; pursue green development; and redouble our efforts to upgrade China from a manufacturer of quantity to one of quality.

智能转型 apply smart technologies
强化基础 strengthen foundations
加快 redouble our efforts to
从制造大国转向制造强国 from a manufacturer of quantity to one of quality

采取财政贴息、加速折旧等措施，推动传统产业技术改造。We will provide subsidies and accelerate equipment depreciation to push forward the technological upgrading of traditional industries.

财政贴息 provide subsidies
加速折旧 accelerate equipment depreciation
技术改造 technological upgrading

坚持有保有压，化解过剩产能，支持企业兼并重组，在市场竞争中优胜劣汰。We will ensure the development of some industries while restricting the growth of others, cut overcapacity, support business acquisitions and restructuring, and let market competition determine which businesses survive.

有保有压 ensure the development of some industries while restricting the growth of others
化解过剩产能 cut overcapacity
兼并重组 acquisitions and restructuring

这里的which businesses 可以注意下，很多人习惯性认为 which 跟单数，其实单复数均可，例如 Which countries have nuclear weapons? - BBC News

促进工业化和信息化深度融合，开发利用网络化、数字化、智能化等技术，着力在一些关键领域抢占先机、取得突破。We will promote the extensive application of information technologies in industrialization, develop and utilize networking, digitalization, and smart technologies, and work to develop certain key areas first and make breakthroughs in these areas.

工业化和信息化深度融合 the extensive application of information technologies in industrialization
关键领域 key areas
抢占先机 work to develop ··· first

“开发利用网络化、数字化、智能化等技术”，和上句一样，各种“化”其实不好翻译，而且决不能千篇一律翻译成 tion 形式，因为有的地方中文去掉化字也不影响意思。

新兴产业和新兴业态是竞争高地。Emerging industries and new types of businesses are areas of intense competition.

竞争高地 areas of intense competition
转移修饰中心到“竞争”，而不是“地”，不过这里意思上有简化，因为高地在很多语境里不只是地区、地点这么简单，往往含有“优势区位”之类的意思。

要实施高端装备、信息网络、集成电路、新能源、新材料、生物医药、航空发动机、燃气轮机等重大项目，把一批新兴产业培育成主导产业。We will launch major projects to develop high-end equipment, information networks, integrated circuits, new energy, new materials, biomedicines, aero engines, and gas turbines, helping a number of emerging industries to become leading ones.

主导产业 leading industries
信息网络 information networks （注意单复数形式）
集成电路 integrated circuits （电路容易写错）
新材料 new materials
生物医药 biomedicines
航空发动机 aero engines
燃气轮机 gas turbines

制定”互联网＋”行动计划，推动移动互联网、云计算、大数据、物联网等与现代制造业结合，促进电子商务、工业互联网和互联网金融健康发展，引导互联网企业拓展国际市场。We will develop the “Internet Plus” action plan to integrate the mobile Internet, cloud computing, big data, and the Internet of Things with modern manufacturing, to encourage the healthy development of e-commerce, industrial networks, and Internet banking, and to guide Internet-based companies to increase their presence in the international market.

物联网 the Internet of Things （冠词与单复数）
电子商务 e-commerce
工业互联网 industrial networks
互联网企业 Internet-based companies
拓展国际市场 increase presence in the international market

国家已设立 400 亿元新兴产业创业投资引导基金，要整合筹措更多资金，为产业创新加油助力。In addition to the 40 billion yuan government fund already in place for investment in China’s emerging industries, more funds need to be raised for promoting business development and innovation.

In addition to 是对原文逻辑的梳理，还是为了避免平铺直叙
加油助力 promote （简化处理）

服务业就业容量大，发展前景广。The service sector can provide an enormous amount of employment opportunities and has vast potential for development.

就业容量大 provide an enormous amount of employment opportunities

要深化服务业改革开放，落实财税、土地、价格等支持政策以及带薪休假等制度，大力发展旅游、健康、养老、创意设计等生活和生产服务业。We will deepen the reform and opening up of the service sector, and implement fiscal, tax, land, and pricing policies to support its development. We will ensure that paid vacations are enforced, and channel great energy into developing tourism, health, elderly care, innovative design, and other better-living and production-related services.

带薪休假 paid vacations
大力发展 channel great energy into developing （注意 ing 形式）
创意设计 innovative design
生活和生产服务业 better-living and production-related services

深化流通体制改革，加强大型农产品批发、仓储和冷链等现代物流设施建设，努力大幅降低流通成本。We will also deepen logistics reform, strengthen the building of modern logistics facilities such as large-scale wholesale, storage,and cold chain facilities for agricultural produce, and work hard to achieve major reductions in logistics costs.

“加强大型农产品批发、仓储和冷链等现代物流设施建设”，英译时也是典型的结构调整，取头尾，中间拖后，用 such as 作列举：
strengthen ··· such as

流通 logistics
大幅降低流通成本 achieve major reductions in logistics costs

以体制创新推动科技刨新。创新创造关键在人。We will use institutional innovation to drive scientific and technological innovation. It is people who make innovations and create things.

关键在人 It is people who
推动 drive
创新创造 make innovations and create things

关键也是个小高频词，全文 9 次。这里顺便解释下为什么不同句子里译法不同，因为一是词随语境变化，“意思意思”和“没什么意思”里的“意思”自然有不同意思；而是语言不能死板，不能一句话翻来覆去用。

所以背词汇表可以，生搬词汇表则不可取，尤其是中英对照词汇。

① 发展是硬道理，是解决一切问题的基础和关键
development is of primary importance to China; it is both the basis for and the key to solving every problem we face.

② 新的一年是全面深化改革的关键之年
This coming year will be crucial for comprehensively deepening reform

③ 推进农业现代化，改革是关键。
Reform is key to modernizing agriculture.

要加快科技成果使用处置和收益管理改革，扩大股权和分红激励政策实施范围We will speed up the reform to manage the use and commoditization of and the distribution of profit from scientific and technological advances of public institutions and extend the coverage of policies which allow for incentive mechanisms for innovation based on shares and dividends.

股权和分红 shares and dividends
扩大······ 范围 extend the coverage of

完善科技成果转化、职务发明法律制度，使创新人才分享成果收益。Legislation on the commercialization of research and development deliverables and on-the-job inventions should be improved so that inventors can enjoy a share of the returns on their inventions.

职务发明 on-the-job inventions
创新人才 inventors
分享收益 enjoy a share of the returns on ···

制定促进科研人员流动政策，改革科技评价、职称评定和国家奖励制度，推进科研院所分类改革。We will formulate policies for encouraging the flow of researchers and engineers, reform the systems for assessing their achievements, for appraising them for the conferral of professional titles, and for granting national awards, and reform research institutions according to their functions.

科研人员流动 the flow of researchers and engineers
职称评定 the conferral of professional titles
国家奖励 national awards
推进······分类改革 reform ··· according to their functions
Conferral [kən'fə:rəl] （称号、学位、权力等的）授予，赐给

引进国外高质量人才和智力。We will work to attract high-caliber foreign professionals and bring in other expertise from overseas.

高质量人才 high-caliber professionals
Bring in 再次出现。

深入实施知识产权战略行动计划，坚决打击侵权行为，切实保护发明创造，让创新之树枝繁叶茂。We will fully implement the action plan for carrying out the national strategy on intellectual property rights, crack down on infringements, and ensure inventions and creative work are thoroughly protected to keep innovation thriving.

切实保护 thoroughly protect
坚决打击 crack down on
侵权行为 infringements （“行为”也是概括词，可略去不译）
让创新之树枝繁叶茂 keep innovation thriving （简化处理）

title: 2015年政府工作报告学习笔记（39）
